Title: The 20's
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Don Roos, Kay Oyegun (story editor), Jas Waters (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Trick-or-treating with the kids goes awry for Jack and Rebecca; The Big Three have life-changing Halloweens.
